welcome-2: Earn your first points and prepare yourself for your unique ROY Experience.
question: Question
are-you-ready-description-1: Accept the challenge and test your knowledge about the ROY universe!
are-you-ready-description-2: Earn your first points throughout this game and prepare yourself for your unique ROY Experience.
how-to-play-description-1: In this game you will see different statements, one after the other.
how-to-play-description-2: For each statement, you must decide which of the two solutions is correct.
how-to-play-description-3: Swipe the statement to the RIGHT or LEFT, in the direction of the correct answer.
how-to-play-description-4: If you close the game, you will continue from where you left in the next session.
how-to-play-description-5: After you sorted in all statements, the game is over and you cannot play again.
statement-correct-or-not-correct: Is this statement correct or wrong?
wheel-press-and-release: Hold pressed, load up and release
point-shooter-press-and-release: Hold pressed, load up and release
end-game-1: You completed the ROY 50/50 Speed Quiz Game!
end-game-2: Check your current score on the leaderboard and try to reach the top!
why-should-we-collect-this-information: Why should we collect this information?
scorm-finished: The learn module is marked as completed.
scorm-not-finished: The learn module is not marked as completed.
